# Select Component

### Select

**Exports:**
- `Select.Root` - Root select container
- `Select.Trigger` - Select trigger button
- `Select.Value` - Selected value display
- `Select.Content` - Select dropdown content
- `Select.Item` - Select option item

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Select } from 'kampsy-ui';

	let value = $state('');
</script>

<Select.Root bind:value class="w-full lg:w-auto" >
	<Select.Trigger class="w-full lg:w-[200px]">
		<Select.Value placeholder="select a friuit" />
	</Select.Trigger>
	<Select.Content>
		<Select.Item value="apple">apple</Select.Item>
		<Select.Item value="banana">banana</Select.Item>
		<Select.Item value="orange">orange</Select.Item>
		<Select.Item value="pineapple">pineapple</Select.Item>
	</Select.Content>
</Select.Root>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```
